page.title: 11Village Life- Leisure
page.content: Apart from the peaceful open countryside most leisure activities in this area are centred on the home and various organisations. One such group-the Yaxham Amenities, organises a number of annual events including a Car Treasure Hunt.It starts at Well Hill and finishes at the Church Hall,with a barbeque and games.Before the start the mileage of each car is recorded.Each competitor has two or three sheets with clues.These clues and directions tell the participants what routes to take. The main task might be to find different wild flowers. The more flowers you get and answers you get right the more points you win The person with the most points wins first prize and the one with the least points gets the booby prize.
